description.0: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

0.0: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>16%</cryo> and DEF is increased by <cryo>16%</cryo>. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo>.

1.0: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo> and DEF is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>30%</cryo>.

2.0: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo> and DEF is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo>. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>36%</cryo>.

3.0: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>28%</cryo> and DEF is increased by <cryo>28%</cryo>. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>42%</cryo>.

4.0: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>32%</cryo> and DEF is increased by <cryo>32%</cryo>. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by <cryo>48%</cryo>.
